biotools.summary: Rapid density based algorithm for detecting clusters in localization microscopy datasets. The algorithm is easily optimized to reduce artifacts that commonly degrade image reconstructions and minimize the detection of false or pseudo clusters.

bioschemas.name: FOCAL
